name: TRASH - DVD
description: TRASH - DVD Todd Barnes' latest DVD - Awesome DVD, great editing, great soundtrack, loads of riders, hawaii, oz, shipsterns, mexico and more... dont miss this one! Review from Spongercity.com : If "The Inside" had a baby with "No Friends 1" it might be TRASH, it's got a bit of both world with grainy/arty footage like NF1 back the days and some fuct up / mash up footage from all the crazyness that surrounds us everyday. The riding is insane with all the pros you can name (Ben Player, Joe Clark, Tom Rigby, James Kates, Jase Finlay, Tom Robinson or Mitch Rawlins). Hard to remember one specific highlight from the DVD but Mitch Rawlins' footage definitely shines with absolutely perfect bottom turns and scooping style unrivaled by most riders). The heli footage at Nuggan is another insane feature in the video. You need to watch it to understand what we're talking about. Shipsterns part shows some of the craziest stuff we've seen out there. The end section that never ends with more amazing footage is another great surprise in this video. Once again Todd Barnes delivered the goods with yet another great DVD, very well filmed and edited with a soundtrack that should please all public.

name: HOME BREW - DVD
description: HOME BREW - DVD Sleepless nights. roadkill. tantrums. chris james. blowouts. good times. high seas. rolled skis. riggaz. roadkill. get it india with t rob. salad sanga. 1979. who is jordan putland. broken backs. night shift. desert storm. michael novy ripping. steel horse. bennett. vertigo. ewan donkey. warm stew. eagle. chopper reid. quick hit. roadkill. cup o joe. busted ankle. hey squishy. maricon. sea legs. balls deep. dangerous d. white line fever. finners me boy. is this really happening. steeplechase. pure. mundra. snake eyes. goonbag. lewy. home brew. Check the teaser here: http://vimeo.com/54587236 A film by Stoke Machine  Presented by Iamnone, Zion, Stoke Factory  Edited by James Kates  Filmed by Ryan Mattick and Allan Wilson  Art direction/titles by Dav Fox  Running Time: 45 mins Includes free IAMNONE, ZION, CROWS FEET, and HOME BREW stickers!

name: EARLY MORNING SOCIAL CLUB - DVD
description: EARLY MORNING SOCIAL CLUB - DVD New DVD from Caleb Graham, this teaser made us froth... and now we can watch the DVD ! Limited quantities ! Dont wait til it's gone !

name: RING OF FIRE III - DVD
description: RING OF FIRE III - DVD by Rob Isambert Ring of Fire 3 is a bodyboard film which features footage from all over California, Mexico, New South Wales, Gold Coast, Tahiti, Hawaii and the South Pacific. There is lots of unseen footage from all the pros in maxing Puerto Escondito, Punta Colorada and the North Shore of Hawaii. In addition, there is a segment of some of the best helmet cam shots from around the world. Josh Garner gets California's Wedge all to himself and sets the bar for how to ride one of the worlds most popular bodyboard waves. Extras include highlights from the Zicatella and Pipeline pro, two of the heaviest contests in recent memory. With just under an hour of top notch bodyboarding action from around the world, Ring of Fire 3 will captivate you from the moment you press play. Watch the teaser:

name: LAUNCH - DVD
description: LAUNCH - DVD From the Launch crew: After 100,000 views online, we decided to turn the Launch 'Bodyboarding Podcast' Series into a short DVD. Completely re-edited, with additional footage from the Phillipines and Hawaii. The case, is an exclusive 14 page booklet with photo's from top photographers: Ian Osterloh, Ray Collins, Jeremy Creswell, Luke Shadbolt, Nick Bannehr and Mark Thompson

name: HOLD - DVD
description: HOLD - DVD by Lucas Vazquez A film by Lucas Vazquez and Tyson Peisley, starring Ben Player, Ewan Donnachie, Chirs James, Jason Finlay, Alex Bunting, Jose Marquina, Dallas Singer and Dave Winchester. Filmed in Australia.

name: NOTHING - DVD
description: NOTHING - DVD NOTHING - DVD by Rob Sherwood A neatly edited bodyboard film, created for people to enjoy the art of bodyboarding. It's based around central and south coast of NSW, Australia. Featuring Ben Player, James Nymeyer, Pierre Louis Costes, Amaury Lavernhe, Dallas Singer, Wade Masters and more.

name: PURE - DVD
description: PURE - DVD PURE - DVD by Nic Barcley. A visual project filmed over the past 18 months on the coast lines of Australia. Sick dropknee section with Kim Feast, sick North Point footage and overall epic action filmed by Nic !

name: Spongercity Captain Cap
description:
The Spongercity Captain Trucker Cap - Limited Edition We did a very Limited Edition of these crazy caps just because they looked too cool (or too crap) not to be made! Awesome look, awesome confort! The real captain trucker cap, the real deal! We seriously have a very very small amount of these and the embroidery cost us more than the average trucker caps that's why they're like 5 bucks more expensive. One of a kind trucker cap hey! 100% Polyester Front 100% Nylon Mesh Back - Embroided Spongercity® Logo in the front with gold color thread - 5-panel cap - Seamless Foam Front Panel with Lining - Matching Oak Leaves Color Braid - Matching Fabric Undervisor - Matching Color Sweatband - Plastic Adjustable Snap Embroided in the USA.
